l, EE, BB, EB = test_map.eb_power_spectrum(l_edges)
assert l.shape == EE.shape == BB.shape == EB.shape
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(l, l * (l + 1) * EE / (2.0 * np.pi), label='$P_{EE}$')
ax.plot(l, l * (l + 1) * BB / (2.0 * np.pi), label='$P_{BB}$')
ax.plot(l, l * (l + 1) * np.abs(EB) / (2.0 * np.pi), label=
    '$\\vert P_{EB}\\vert$')
ax.set_xscale('log')
ax.set_yscale('log')
ax.set_xlabel('$l$')
ax.set_ylabel('$l(l+1)P_l/2\\pi$')
ax.legend(loc='Upper left')
plt.savefig('EB.png')
plt.clf()
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(l, np.abs(EB) / np.sqrt(EE * BB))
ax.set_xlabel('$l$')
ax.set_ylabel('$P_{EB}/\\sqrt{P_{EE}P_{BB}}$')
plt.savefig('EB_corr.png')
plt.clf()
